text: Draft. During my bachelor party long weekend in the san francisco area, Mikkeller SF. Super purple pour with lighter head. This was intense for flavor, super sweet, super tart, super fruity. Raspberries, wine, oak and funky.

Draught @ Mikkeller & Friends, Stefansgade 35, DK-2200 Copenhagen N, Denmark. [ As Mikkeller SpontanTripleRaspberry ].Dark purple red color with a small to average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, off-white - pink head. Aroma is moderate to heavy raspberry, barnyard, leather. Flavor is moderate sweet and acidic with a long duration, barnyard, raspberry, tart, funky, dry. Body is medium, texture is oily to watery, carbonation is soft. [20160515]
 9-4-8-4-16

Bloods red but lacks that appearance that the quad blueberry had. blood red legs coat the glass when you swirl. this isnÂ’t really beer. Just smells like a bowl full of candied crushed raspberries. ItÂ’s not really fair to rate this. Hurts my mouth from the acid.
Draft at CBC - pours red pink head - nose/taste of tons of raspberry, jammy funk, oak - medium body

8.2%ABV. Lambic.

Tapped out dark purple. 38ÂºSRM.

Nose has the usual spontan aromas. Strong sweet fruity, blackcurrant jelly or juice aromas. Ribena comes to mind. There is a slightly sweet fruity dimension to the nose which is paired with a deeply wine-like aroma with vinegar, wood, stone dust.

Mouthfeel is unfiltered juice with a bit of fruity pulpy depth. Palate is a little unusual with a smoky, resinous, epoxy type flavors at first, but if you tease it out might be a combination of charred wood and liquid smoke and old hookah water (tobacco in water) and urea, coming on very strong and instantaneously on the palate at the same time as a very aggressive sour tartness, with all this on fumes of alcohol. Otherwise, the palate settles into a sullen vaguely fruity palate with a bitter that suggests tanins, raspberry seeds, chia seeds.

Finish is residual acidity with some bitter-tart tongue-fee that you get with fresh cranberry juice.

A very interesting taste experience.

Brewskival 2016, friday session. Very dark beer with a nice beige/dark pink head. Sourish raspberry aroma, blackberries, grapes, tart, strawberry notes. Sourish raspberry flavor, tart, vinous notes, wild strawberries. Well hidden alcohol.

[5/10/16] Draught at Mikkeller & Friends in Copenhagen. Deep red color with pinkish beige head. Big raspberries aroma with funk, oak, cobwebs. Sour flavor, funky, with oak, cellar, lots of juicy raspberries. Rounded mouthfeel. Lovely.
On tap at Mikkeller & Friends. Dark ruby with a pink head. Sour, raspberries, grapes, lambic funk.

Draft at Mikkeller & Friends shared thanks to fonefan. Very hazy reddish brown with a ring tan head. Aroma of huge fresh raspberry, tart red berries. Flavour is light sweet and moderate sour. Medium bodied with soft carbonation.

Draught at mikkeller and friends. 
Pours gray red. 
Very tart and fruity taste of raspberry.

Draft at mikkeller and friends 
Purple deep color, white head 
Aroma of raspberry lemonade, lovely summer
Taste sweet raspberry, heavy sour. Nice! Nice!
Tap at mikkeller and friends, copenhagen. Dark red color, white head. Aroma has sour notes, raspberries, fruits. Super sour taste, raspberries, fruits.

On tap at Mikkeller & Friends. Medium brown with very little head. Aroma is raspberry jam, other red fruits. Medium bodied, sticky mouthfeel, tart on the palate with some nice fruit character. Taste is raspberry, sour red fruit, raspberry jam.

Draft. An unclear red beer with a pink head. The aroma has notes of raspberries, brettanomyces, and lemons. The flavor is sour with notes of raspberries, brettanomyces, and alcohol, leading to a tart finish.

Aroma and taste is prominent raspberry fruity, deep complex raspberry, stone fruit, berry skin, slight vinegar, tart on the palate, stunning.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Tap @Warpigs, Cph. Pours murky dark red with a small, creamy, pink film head. Aroma has lots of raspberry, a bit of cherry stone, light vinious. Low carbonation, fine dry and quite creamy mouthfeel. Flavour has serious raspberry sourness, fresh raspberry juice, sweet and sour in perfect combination. Very sticky, somewhat vinious. Very lovely, too bad the aroma is a bit bland.
From tap at Warpigs. Hazy dark reddish colour with a small reddish head. Aroma and flavour raspberries, acidic and tartness.
From tap. Pours hazy deep purple, small pink head. Sweet, citric and sulphorish. Sour, tart and sulphorish. Dense super fruity. Rich and solid finish.

Draft @ Koelschip, Copenhagen. Pours a deep red ruby color with a small off-white head. Has a fruity sour tart strong raspberry aroma. Fruity spicy sour tart acidic raspberry flavor. Has a fruity sour tart raspberry finish.

Tap @ Mikkeller Aarhus. Pours murky red with a white head. Aroma of raspberries, vinegar, wood, balsamic and funk. Much less fruity forward than the triple cassis. Still nice smell though bit the funky and tart notes are more dominant. The taste is very sour and has some balsamic, vinegar, raspberries and wood.

Draught. Creamy White good mostly lasting head. Red colour. Light malty and hoppy exstrenely powerfull raspberry aroma. Acetic and sour as it should be. Heavy raspbery flavor. long fantastic intende finish. Creamy palate. Fantastic and expensive.

Draught at WarPigs Brewpub, Copenhagen. Murkey red/brown - white edges. 
High raspberries. Nice sourness. Acid. Fruity. Tannins. Citric. Acid on tongue. Light flowery. High dryness. Fresh raspberries. Herbal notes. Lemon like sourness. Lovely.

Tap @ Mikkeller Aarhus opening night. Light hazy red pour with a frothy white head. Nose has raspberries, funk and leather. Taste has jammy raspberries, lots of barrel character, leather, oak and some vanilla.

Tap. Hazy deep purple body with a small pinkish head. Aroma of raspberries, barnyard and lemon notes. Sour flavor that ends up heavy tart and quite bitter. Medium bodied, oily texture and average carbonation. A solid and excellent Sour. ðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸðŸŒŸ

Draught @ Mikkkeller, Aarhus. Pours very dark brown with a small offwhite head, light lacings. Aroma of light sourness, wood, rich tart raspberries, tart fruit, light vinegar. Flavor is very very sour, tart fruit, wood, sweet and sour raspberries. Medium body, average carbonation, very sour and acidic finish. 281115

Tap @ Mikkeller Bar, Aarhus. Nice pink head with good duration. Color is deep purple. Aroma and taste are rich raspberries, lactose acid, brett, flowers and malt. Real nice and rich finish. A real plaque remover.

Tap @ MikkellerBar, Aarhus, 10%. Deep red with medium off-white head. Aroma is malt, raspberries , sour, barnyard, fruit and tart. Flavour is malt, raspberries, tart, barnyard, sour, little acid, dry and lemon.

Tap @ Mikkeller, Aarhus. Hazy reddish brown with a small off-white head. Aroma is sweet, malty, heavy raspberries and barnyard. Flavor is quite sweet and rather acidic. Dry and rather acidic finish. 281115
